text: Jikheun dum le jih jipeuna-peuna Haba duseuta jikheun keu Allah Meunyo Neukheundak Allah TaÊ»ala Lam ate gata Neucap bek teuhah Nyang bateu salah bandum Neusampoh Tinggai nyang neutroh nyanggot-got leupah Neumeung peubeuna nyang keubenaran Deungon Qur'an kalimah Allah Peue nyang lam dada bandum Neuteupue Hana meusapeue pih na meuilah
